comments: A Beatty conjugate modulo 9 of the Pi irrational rotation.What is unique about this sequence is that it can be broken up into nine "orthogonal" binary sequences. It also determines a unique irrational number that is very probably a transcendental number as well.
author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Jun 27 2002
